title: Ep 498 | Phil Teaches How to Know if a Spirit Is from God & Why You Can Never Be Too Far Gone
description:
Phil and Al are joined by Zach Dasher to discuss discernment, and Phil reveals how to really know whether a spirit is from God or not. Al points out that because of God's omnipresence and the grace of Jesus Christ, a human can never be too far gone to be redeemed by salvation that is not earned, but freely given. Al begins a discussion on the superiority of Jesus Christ that will continue through several chapters of Hebrews. Phil points out that humans want to be under a law and a system no matter what. And Zach brings up an idea explored by T.S. Eliot: that man dreams of systems so perfect that nobody will have to be good.
